snippet: The bruised body of a 23-month-old boy was discovered in Brooklyn after his mother called 911 early Saturday morning.
abstract: The bruised body of a 23-month-old boy was discovered in Brooklyn after his mother called 911 early Saturday morning.

byline.original: By AL BAKER and TIM STELLOH

headline.main: Boy Is Found Dead in Brooklyn
headline.print_headline: In Two Boroughs, Deaths Of Children Are Investigated
